themes.description: This theme covers feedback and requests related to specific trading functionalities, order types, and investment tools within the platform.
This theme covers complaints about features or functionalities that are absent or not available within the platform.
This theme covers feedback related to changes in existing features, including design updates, functionality alterations, or preferences for previous versions.
This theme covers issues related to account opening, segment activation, KYC verification, or any problems preventing full account functionality.
This theme covers issues related to enabling, disabling, or managing application features, including user control and ease of access.
This theme covers feedback related to investment performance, perceived losses, or the overall financial results experienced by users through the application.
Reviews related to requests for new features, improvements to existing features, or promotional offers and benefits.
This theme addresses issues related to account security, fraud allegations, unauthorized transactions, and overall trust in the platform's safety.
This theme covers feedback regarding the process, fairness, and outcomes of IPO applications and allotments.
Feedback related to the ease of use, intuitiveness, and overall user-friendliness of the application.
Suggestions for new features, enhancements, or general improvements to the application's offerings or benefits.
Reviews expressing general opinions, warnings, or philosophical objections about online investing, market risks, or the nature of financial platforms, rather than specific app features or services.
Reviews related to the general usefulness, functionality, or overall positive/negative sentiment about the application's core purpose.
Reviews focusing on the ease of use, intuitiveness, or user-friendliness of the application's interface and features.
Reviews detailing issues with incorrect trade execution, manipulated transaction records, miscategorized holdings, or discrepancies in profit/loss reporting.
Reviews concerning the availability, quality, or effectiveness of investment research tools, stock picking assistance, or analytical features within the application.
This theme covers requests for expanding the range of tradable assets, such as international stocks, currencies, or new financial instruments.
This theme includes requests for enhanced display of investment details, such as current NAV, purchased NAV, current value, and invested value for portfolio tracking.
Requests for new features, functionalities, or asset classes to be added to the platform.
This theme includes reviews that express overall satisfaction or positive sentiment about the platform without focusing on a specific feature or issue.
This theme covers feedback related to the ease of use, intuitiveness, and overall user experience of the application.
This theme covers feedback regarding the app's suitability for new users, ease of getting started, and overall onboarding experience.
Covers feedback related to the app's design, ease of use, navigation, and overall user interface.
This theme covers requests for new features, improvements to existing functionalities, or missing data displays within the application.
General feedback, positive or negative, about the overall user interface, design, or ease of use of the application.
Requests or feedback related to charting tools, technical indicators, or other analytical functionalities within the platform.
Issues or requests related to account setup, profile management, nominee details, or other administrative functions.
This theme covers problems related to Know Your Customer (KYC) verification, including incomplete status, inability to update KYC, or restrictions due to KYC status.
This theme captures general positive feedback, appreciation for new features, or overall satisfaction with the application's capabilities and user experience.
Concerns related to data security, privacy, sharing of personal information, and unauthorized access.
Covers overall satisfaction, ease of use, general positive/negative feedback, and suitability for specific user groups (e.g., beginners) when no specific feature is mentioned.
Reviews related to the quality or availability of investment advice, market insights, or educational content provided by the platform.
Reviews that compare the current platform to competitors or suggest using other platforms.
Reviews concerning the range and quality of financial products or investment options available on the platform, such as mutual funds or specific trading instruments.
Overall positive or neutral comments about the application that do not relate to specific issues or feature requests.
